WEATHER FORECAST FOR 13 MARCH 2025
Issued at 2.00 p.m. on 12 March 2025

A
 few showers will occur in Eastern province and in Mullaitivu district.

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at a few places in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces
and in Galle, Matara and Kurunegala districts during the afternoon or night.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
